name: Project Ghost (Jelindo)
description:
Lose control of yourself in this unique 2D puzzle platformer. 

It may look simple, until you realize that for every death, something mysterious happens....

Can you beat all fifteen screens?

Controls:

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Space / Up arrow / W
  • Enter Doors - E
  • Reset Level - R

Game by Jonathan L. & Luis G.

Undergraduate Students of Northeastern University, Class of 2024
